raw_text: ABEYWICKREMA IRANDI (nee GOONEWARDENE) – Beloved wife of late Sumith,​ mother of Yasas,​ Sumedha and Roshini,​ mother-in-law of Vishni,​ Vishani and Suranjeeva,​ grandmother of Heshan and Suchita,​ Isuri and Bavantha and Jaliya,​ great grandmother of Jayden and Cayden,​ passedaway peacefully on 4th August 2023.053283

GONAWELA – MRS FLORENCE MARY (nee MARTINSTYNE) called to Rest on 23rd August 2023. Beloved wife of late Mr James Gonawela,​ sister of Noble,​ late Dora,​ Percy,​ Henry,​ Villie,​ Gordon,​ loving mother of Christopher,​ Andrew,​ Mervin,​ Aubrey,​ Patrick and Mark. Remains lie at “Restpect” 483,​ Bauddhaloka Mawatha,​ Colombo 08 from Saturday 26th August,​ 6.00 p.m. to 10.00 p.m. and Sunday 27th August 8.00 p.m. to 2.30 p.m. Cortege leaves Parlour for Service at Christ Church,​ Mission Road,​ Kotte at 3.00 p.m. and followed by the Burial at 3.30 p.m.053253

STAVE – JOHN – Beloved husband of Kumari,​ everloving father of late Jakola,​ Angelo,​ Nicola (Australia),​ Jessica,​ Jacqulina,​ Camy and Shervon,​ father-in-law of Stella,​ Chamika (Australia),​ Suresh and Rohan,​ grandfather of Dorian,​ Ethan (Australia),​ Hayden,​ Nathan (Australia),​ Brandan (Australia),​ Sophia,​ Callan and Calliope,​ son of the late Tony and Gertrude Stave,​ brother of Arlene (Australia),​ Susan (Australia),​ Felician,​ Ingrid and Gereard,​ brother-in-law of Keiran (Australia),​ Travis (Australia),​ late Luckshmi. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour at 4.00 p.m. on Saturday the 26th August for Burial at General Cemetery Borella. (Roman Catholic Section).053221
